ygData.subject: Re: Where???
ygData.msgSnippet: I did CB to 18 myself to my shame but then i moved to highpass off kith forest to 21 its great exp but seems to be only camped from 10am to 1am and MUST be a
ygData.messageBody:
I did CB to 18 myself to my shame but then i moved to highpass off
kith forest to 21 its great exp but seems to be only camped from 10am
to 1am and MUST be a group then i moved to the highpass keep. ON
another toon I moved at 18 from highpass to South Karana to hunt at
KFC or avaik huts this is a 18 to 26 area or hunt gnolls in lake
rath. on the solo side try East karana animals by the xorbb or
wodden bridge side. also on solo side is Lava storm and Najena. if
you dont have expansions do the oasis-highpass-highkeep-splitpaw-SOl
A-GUk-hole to mid 50s

hope this helps .... Bard of Povar


> I know I asked this a while ago and it sparked a big conversation,
> but I am higher lvl now and I don't know where to go. I am almost
> lvl 18 and I am still in TR (Throne Room in CB). I am not getting
> good experience except from crush who still cons yellow. Where
> should I hunt. I only have the original and it gets me angry when
> everyone tells me to go to the Lake of ILL Omen in Kunark. Where
can
> I go that is still in the old world?
>
>
> Zinog <Dragons Honor>
> 17th level Paladin
> Xegony
